instructions.localDevelopment: This file is used when running locally. Modify the 'senders' array for local testing.
instructions.production: For production use, set SENDER_EMAILS_LIST as a GitHub Variable or Secret with comma-separated email addresses: 'email1@example.com,email2@example.com'
